website_summaries.verdict: The perfect choice for both warmth and comfort at a reasonable price point.
pros: Available in a range of neutral and bright colors
Lined with ultra-soft faux Sherpa fleece
Safe for machine wash. Shams close with a zipper
Square stitching pattern is aesthetically pleasing
cons: Included pillow cases are too small for king-size pillows

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this Sherpa comforter super excited for the comfort and happy for the price. However, it comes and the pillow had a rip along the zipper so it would not close properly so I ordered a replacement thinking it was a fluke thing. Second comforter, has stains all over it. I expect stains and tears to happen as you own it and live with it, not when your order it. Two stars because it was soft, sad it didn’t work out.
customer_reviews.author: Delaney

customer_reviews.title: gift
customer_reviews.text: I bought this comforter as a gift for my elderly parents...they love it. My mom can't stop thanking me for purchasing this comforter for them. Mom says it is lightweight, warm, soft, washes well, and a dream to sleep under. I am glad I purchased this for them...now I am their favorite daughter. Oh wait...I am their only daughter!!!
customer_reviews.author: Linda T.

customer_reviews.title: You wont want to leave your bed
customer_reviews.text: Took it out of the package, washed it, took the pictures and am currently laying in the sheets. So comfortable and fluffy! They handled the wash well and they are incredibly soft. Love the pillow cases it came with as well. Great gift or for yourself!!
customer_reviews.author: Emily Vancore

customer_reviews.title: too small
customer_reviews.text: it is soft and comfy but really small does not cover my king size bed. I can still see my sheets all around the sides.
customer_reviews.author: porschia

customer_reviews.title: Natural
customer_reviews.text: If you want something light, this is the wrong comforter. It's not too bulky, but it does keep you very warm. Fabric is soft, neutral so it can be paired with any patterns/ textures
customer_reviews.author: K8te

customer_reviews.title: Cozy
customer_reviews.text: So soft and comfortable. I've had this for little over a week. So far I love it. I've read all the reviews so I knew the pillow shams fit a standard size pillow. No big deal. It's a really nice comforter and fits my king size bed. I've had this 4 month's now and wash everything at least 5-6 times it this looking goog.
customer_reviews.author: Diane

customer_reviews.title: Wow..love.
customer_reviews.text: This is super soft and cozy. I'm in love. It's like sleeping in a cloud. Yes the pillow cases are a tad small for a king pillow, but I was able to stuff mine in and it worked perfectly. Keeps you warm!
customer_reviews.author: ex2mommy

customer_reviews.title: Sloppy seams
customer_reviews.text: After about a week of using the blanket, we found the seam at the tags open. I thought it was a fluke, so I returned it for a replacement. I examined the replacement blanket after it arrived and it all seemed fine, but after I put it in the wash for the first time, a seam came open. My daughter likes the blanket color, how soft it is and the weight, so instead of going through the trouble of returning it, I am repairing the seam myself. =(
customer_reviews.author: Alien

customer_reviews.title: Difference in Color
customer_reviews.text: I purchased the charcoal as a gift for my boyfriend this Christmas. When the package arrived I noticed almost immediately that the color was not the same as pictured, it has a definite greeny/blue tint to it. It is a decent comforter, its fairly thin which is nice because it still keeps you warm without you getting too hot. I can tell that it probably isn't going to last very long, but for now its pretty good! The color is the main disappointment for me, it makes it look cheap. I added a photo to my review, his sheets are a true charcoal so you can compare it to the color of the comforter!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This blanket is sooo warm, I thought it was ...
customer_reviews.text: This blanket is sooo warm, I thought it was rather thin and wouldn’t keep me warm. I was absolutely wrong, this keeps me warm on the freezing nights with my air conditioner blowing plus my fan lol.
customer_reviews.author: Jay

customer_reviews.title: SO SOFT
customer_reviews.text: Got the twin size for my teen's room. He LOVES it, and the cats also wholly approve. Very warm and snuggly!
customer_reviews.author: Sheryl Oski

customer_reviews.title: Very, very disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I bought the exact same cover on December 1, 2018, and used it for 7 months. It was a delight. It was soft and each square on the cover was smooth and even. I often showed it off to friends visiting. I bought the exact same cover on August 9 and it is a disaster. Each square in rough and some parts have welts on them so it looks tacky. I actually gad to go back and buy a different style from another company. Amazon Basics sheets are inferior, the quilts are as well, and so is the second Micromink Sherpa Comforter. Clem Mackiewicz
customer_reviews.author: Clement Mackiewicz

customer_reviews.title: Don't do it
customer_reviews.text: I played myself buying this. It's extremely thin and came with an extra side of rips and holes. The pillow cases it came with were pretty cheap too. Save your money and spend up.
customer_reviews.author: Irvin

customer_reviews.title: Good but not so great
customer_reviews.text: I like the color, how light in weight it is, and that it's very comfortable and warm. What I am disappointed in is the quality of the stitching. It came unravelling.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very happy with price and comforter
customer_reviews.text: After searching for a comforter this one seemed to be the one we both agreed on. The color is a nice vibrant purple! It is very soft and fits my king bed just right, not too big or small. It’s not fluffy but more like a thicker throw/blanket. My girlfriend loves it!
customer_reviews.author: jared

customer_reviews.title: Pillow shams fit a standard size pillow. Super soft and warm.
customer_reviews.text: I love it. My husband purchased for me as a Christmas gift. It is super soft, cozy lightweight and warm. I am cold natured and I had to take the blanket off during the night because I got hot. (I have fleece sheets on my bed as well.) It is super soft and cozy on both sides. I have a king size bed and it hung over the sides very nicely-not to short or long on either side. I absolutely love my bed set. The color is very vibrant and looks just like the picture. Pillow shams fit a standard size pillow. I would highly recommend if you like soft, cozy and warm....
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Soft, Soft, Soft!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Holy cow! This is the most delightful surprise I ever ordered online & that's saying a lot. It is the softest comforter ever! I purchased this for a guest room & have decided I'll be the 1st guest to enjoy the cuddly softness of this bedding. And bonus...the shams zip closed. I've never had zippered shams before & it's a step up from open back or tied shams. Mine are the brown color & it is lush & beautiful! FYI, I rarely review purchases.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It is good and warm
customer_reviews.text: I love this comforter. It is warm and cozy. It is lightweight but a little bulky when wrapping up really tight. Other than that it is a good buy.
customer_reviews.author: Nita

customer_reviews.title: Love this blanket!
customer_reviews.text: OK so first I was very skeptical about ordering this blanket because of the negative reviews. So I just decided to bite the bullet and get it anyways. I absolutely love it. It’s super thick and warm. It comes in a vacuum sealed bag. Upon receiving I washed it immediately. It washed and dried perfectly in my home washer and dryer. A lot of reviews said it didn’t wash properly or it got damaged .....so I was very iffy! But it came out perfect and it’s very heavy and thick for the material. Very high quality at a low price. I ordered a king size.
customer_reviews.author: Samantha

customer_reviews.title: Lies
customer_reviews.text: I bought a charcoal grey comforter and got some sort of green colored one instead. The backboard of my bed is charcoal grey. Don’t buy unless you plan on getting the wrong color.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda Morrell

customer_reviews.title: Nice product
customer_reviews.text: I bought the mink set. The color is a little darker than in the pictures, but still nice and even, as well as super soft on both sides. The shams have a zipper to insert the pillow, but because it's placed on the back rather than on the side, it takes a bit more work than I expected. I washed all three items as soon as I got them, following the instructions on the tag, and they came out perfectly soft and fluffy. Comforter takes a while to dry - I had to put it back in the dryer for a second spin. Overall happy with my purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Clarissa Dng

customer_reviews.title: Wrong size pillow cases !
customer_reviews.text: Bought a king size comforter... Comes with pillow cases that would only fit standard / queen size pillows ?? How can that be ? Now I have to go buy other pillows.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie Correia

customer_reviews.title: Super soft, warm & cozy
customer_reviews.text: I have Reynauds Disease which means I’m basically cold all the time. I was sleeping with three comforters on my bed when I came across this blanket. This blanket is the softest I’ve ever slept under. It’s very warm and on a good night with my Reynauds, I can sleep with just this blanket. On a bad night, I need this blanket plus a regular comforter on top. The only reason I didn’t give this blanket five stars is because the color isn’t really red, it’s more of a pink. My favorite thing about this blanket is how unbelievably soft it is.
customer_reviews.author: Tracy C.

customer_reviews.title: Some Assembly Required
customer_reviews.text: "An Amazon brand product, sold on Amazon, and shipped by Amazon. How could it be THAT bad?" Well, as some of the reviews imply, it might just be poor quality. I saw a tear in it before it was even out of the packaging it came in, so I'm sending this thing back... I got on my computer immediately and demanded money back. -- Which Amazon won't give me, by the way, because they want me to do the work of shipping it back to them first. Then, after they get their shoddy product back, only then will Amazon process a refund. Until then I'm out the money for this.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It's amazing at first and disappointing after awhile
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely loved this blanket when I bought it. it is thick and heavy ish and warm very warm in the winter . However I washed it following the directions and hung dry it and it still managed to become raggedy on the inward portion of it . It has a fluffy soft side to it that is amazing that just turned into this itchy mess over time I love this blanket but I would be hesitant to buy it again
customer_reviews.author: TKBurton

customer_reviews.title: The full/queen BARELY fits a queen. Tore the first week.
customer_reviews.text: This “comforter” is more like a big fuzzy blanket. It’s not as thick as I expected it to be. However it’s very soft and cozy. The pillow cases fit perfectly. There’s no extra bagginess but it wasn’t a struggle to zip up either. My only complaint is that the full/queen size BARELY fits a queen. The end doesn’t droop down the end of the bed like most comforters do. The first week I got it, it tore. I’m scared to put it in the wash.
customer_reviews.author: Lauren Cox-Rincon

customer_reviews.title: The color isn’t as stats it’s a greenish gray color not charcoal
customer_reviews.text: This is no way a comforter , it’s just a large fleece blanket , the charcoal gray is not really a gray more on the side of a greenish gray , fleece blankets are soft and cozy , my complain and only gave one star is the color gray it isn’t , I returning and hopefully can get a real comforter in a true gray ..
customer_reviews.author: Sherry

customer_reviews.title: 2 different colors and was extremely late
customer_reviews.text: Ordered it Sunday and got it Friday even though I have 2 day prime membership shipping. I also think someone slept on the pillow sham before me as they are different colors. I do like the materials and they do feel premium to the touch.
customer_reviews.author: James Franklin

customer_reviews.title: So soft & comfy
customer_reviews.text: This is probably the most comfortable comforter I've ever owned! Blanket is very warm so if you're a hot sleeper keep the AC on so you wont sweat to death. But this is not a complaint by any means, it will come in handy as winter is approaching which is one reason I purchased in the first place. Also I have a queen size bed and read some reviews before purchasing that stated it is cut kinda small and to buy a size up. I did and got a King. That was perfect advice as I believe a queen would've been too small. Overall I am extremely happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Chris Martin

customer_reviews.title: shams that came with comforter were full size not king
customer_reviews.text: Purchased a king size comforter. Nice rich front color but back white is thin and you could see through to the brown,
customer_reviews.author: Gerald Conlon

customer_reviews.title: SUPER soft, LOVE it!
customer_reviews.text: I know my "soft" and this blanket falls under the "butter soft" quality. Took a chance ordering it without being able to touch it, but it's awesome!! Washed it first, little fuzz in the lint screen, if any.... Laid it on the bed and "aahhhh!" I also like that it's not quite as heavy as some of my other soft blankets. (Hope that still means it will last awhile.) Highly recommend for those who like super soft blankets. Btw, I bought the brown and it's like dark coffee brown, FYI.
customer_reviews.author: Mystery Fan

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality
customer_reviews.text: Cheaply made, the square design woven into the fabric will come out the first day. Threads are already falling apart. I recommend you spend the extra money and get a different better quality comforter. Put in dryer and melted.
customer_reviews.author: chris

customer_reviews.title: What a bargain!
customer_reviews.text: Thie texture is soft, the color is beautiful. Wish it included a bed skirt, because the length of the comforter doesn’t cover my box springs completely. Using in guest room for twin beds.
customer_reviews.author: Msmissy82

customer_reviews.title: Don’t buy this!
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful and fluffy. Super warm. The problem is that the first time and every time after you go to pull it up.. to cover those shoulders.. the stitches rip. You can hear them pop no matter how careful you are. Then you are left with the sewing unraveling and slices between your toes when you stretch at night and the threads get in between. Sucks. I won’t ever buy this again and do not recommend it. Wish I’d bought something else even if it cost more. This is what I get for going cheap. Get a cheaply made product.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Feels wonderful!!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this to replace a comforter I bought at Bed Bath and Beyond years ago. It was thick and warm, something much needed in Michigan in the winter. I found this online and ordered it hoping it was the same one. It was not but it is so much better! It is lightweight, extremely soft and works wonderfully! I am glad I bought this particular comforter. While I am still looking for the elusive BB&B one, I will use this one daily...it is that comfortable! Love it!!!
customer_reviews.author: C. Frederick

customer_reviews.title: Heaven!
customer_reviews.text: If I could tell you how many hours online looking and buying different comforters I would be typing all day. All looked so nice but were super itchy and bunched up or too thin and just fell apart. I mean hours looking and reading reviews etc. This one was a snap decision I made the other night laying in the itchy one and crawling out of my skin and it’s the BEST one I have had in forever. It’s so soft, the neutral color goes w/ everything and it’s just warm enough w/ out being hot. My dog jumped up and burrowed a spot and hasn’t left since lol. I’m in love and look forward to sleeping great tonight!
customer_reviews.author: Shell

customer_reviews.title: Material makes me sweaty and sticky.
customer_reviews.text: I disliked how hot the comforter makes me. It is not breathable material. I am constantly pulling it off and back on during the night.
customer_reviews.author: S. Diaz

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful....
customer_reviews.text: I ordered the king set in red/white it is beautiful... Color excellent, soft, seems very well made... BUT the only reason I did not give 5 was because the shams that come with it were Standard NOT King...I asked them to send me the king size shams that I was suppose to get. We will see what happens....
customer_reviews.author: A.S.H.

customer_reviews.title: Pillow shams aren’t for a king size pillow
customer_reviews.text: I order this blanket and is very nice and soft however I order the king size and the pillow shams that came with it won’t fit my pillows :(
customer_reviews.author: adriana

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT BUY! All the stitching is coming out (after return window). Waste of money!
customer_reviews.text: It's too late to return it now and all the stitching is coming apart. I haven't even washed it, so it didn't even come apart in the wash. This would have been a great product if it weren't for that. The fabric is super soft and heavy. But the fact that the stitching is just coming out EVERYWHERE makes it a complete WASTE of money. It's literally garbage already and it's only a few months old. DO NOT BUY! So angry..
customer_reviews.author: Arianna

customer_reviews.title: very poorly stitched
customer_reviews.text: After exchanging this blanket the first time because it had a tear in the middle of it, I received a second one that looked really nice and without any defects. The first time I put it on my bed I was pulling on one side to make sure it was sitting even around the bed frame and when I pulled on it the stitching started coming apart. The next day when I was making the bed I pulled on the blanket again to adjust it and some more of the stitching started coming undone again. Now I carefully adjust it when I use it but the softness and comfort of it is really nice.
customer_reviews.author: Douglas A. Pineda

customer_reviews.title: The blanket is thinner than what I thought
customer_reviews.text: Pillows cover is too small for the king size pillows And The blanket is very thin
customer_reviews.author: Vivi Lee

customer_reviews.title: Better buy two!
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my 14 year old daughter for Christmas, she loved it. I decided to take a nap in her bed yesterday so I could try it out. It’s beautiful!! The color (red) is extremely bright and pretty! It’s very very soft and warm. Needless to say I’ve already ordered one for myself since she wouldn’t let me steal hers ;)
customer_reviews.author: Miss Katie

customer_reviews.title: Terrible quality!
customer_reviews.text: You’ll have whatever color you get fuzz all over your sheets, clothes & hair no matter how many times you wash it. Terrible quality. I had hoped people were exaggerating when they talked about how bad the quality is. It sheds like crazy & upon washing just started pilling & coming apart all over the place. The more you wash it the worse it gets for shedding & fuzz balls. Can’t even use it for the dog cuz it would be more of a mess. Also the shearling side gets hard & itchy after 1st washing. Trash!
customer_reviews.author: SM

customer_reviews.title: Great for a home with out cats that have claws. smile
customer_reviews.text: My issue is that I didn't take into consideration that my cats (with claws) would love to massage this soft blank. That's on me. The comforter is very soft and lightweight and addressed all of what I thought would be perfect for our guest room/ Grandson's room, when we have sleepovers. I would say be a bit thoughtful about buying this if you have animals with claws, otherwise this is a good looking and warm topper.
customer_reviews.author: Taj

customer_reviews.title: Nice Comforter but...
customer_reviews.text: I really like this comforter, it looks great, it is very soft and comfortable, but it is very susceptible to damage. After only a week or so, I have found several rips/tears on it, possibly due to my dog jumping on the bed. At this rate, this thing will be in shreds in a month or two and my dog is not biting, chewing, or anything, just walking on it.
customer_reviews.author: Phil D.

customer_reviews.title: Cheap and falls apart
customer_reviews.text: This is a very cheap product. We do not sleep with it just put it on the bed for open house as we are trying to sell our house. 2 weeks in the seams came apart and it looks bad. 2 weeks. This lasted 2 weeks with no one actually using it. I can’t send it back because I still need it for open houses but do not buy this, it’s not worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Claudia

customer_reviews.title: Arrived w a rip in it on the top of the duvet
customer_reviews.text: I ordered a king for my queen bed but it was quite large for my queen bed. Some reviewers did mention the full/queen wasn't large enough for their queen and that's why they ordered the king. For my queen bed it was a bit large. that wasn't a big deal to us, however, it arrived with a rip on the top of it. My bf and I don't want the hassle of packing it up and sending it back to be returned and replaced so we are just resigned to it. Quality control must have been lacking for the product, for sure and we are quite disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Yong

customer_reviews.title: Comforter is not at all like photos
customer_reviews.text: I ordered the charcoal gray in the King Size and it’s nothing like the photos. It’s velour and not at all as described. It also does not fit a king size bed. The king size would fit a queen. I would not recommend this comforter at all
customer_reviews.author: LC

customer_reviews.title: No bargain
customer_reviews.text: You get what you pay for...I needed the light blue color so I had no choice of other brands. This is very light weight in comparison to others I’ve purchased in the past. We live in New England and winter is coming...so you either pay a high heating bill or get good quality bedding...I didn’t make the right choice
customer_reviews.author: Chud

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: I bought this based on color, softness and cost. Intended use for a toddler bed who is infatuated with softness. The colored side is extremely soft and the weight is perfect. The sherpa side is less soft than the colored side, but still comfortable and not scratchy as some cheap sherpa materials can be. We have cold winters and my daughter has huge windows in her room so this was intended to give her some added warmth during the winter months. I don't see any issues with construction or materials lasting over time, and you aren't going to find a better value anywhere. Believe me, I look at everything before making purchases. :)
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: OMG!
customer_reviews.text: The softness! Plus, it comes with more softness, pillow cases! OMG! Buy it now! Don't wait! Thankfully, It's available in several colors and I don't have to keep using the same one over and over again. I'm going to look at them now and buy more softness!
customer_reviews.author: shawn

customer_reviews.title: Super warm and snuggly!
customer_reviews.text: As some have noted, when you first pull this out of the bag, it seems too thin to really be warm. However, I've found that it is very warm and cozy to sleep under, and my cats love the velvety surface. The only drawback is that their claws have made several pulls in the top material, but I've mostly been able to pull the snags through to the back side. I'd recommend this comforter.
customer_reviews.author: M. Lee

customer_reviews.title: So glad I changed out my other comforters
customer_reviews.text: I fully didn't expect to love this thing as much as I do, and i was apprehensive about buying it after reading the reviews which made it sound like it could easily get damaged. What's so amazing About it is that it does an excellent job at regulating my body temperature. I'm never hot or cold, it's somehow always the perfect temperature. I like to sleep in a cooler room - right now that's about 60 F. I have a regular bed sheet, a thin knitted blanket, and this comforter. If this one ever got damaged, I wouldn't hesitate to buy it again !
customer_reviews.author: Mr. DMC

customer_reviews.title: It's a bright velvety red, but warm and will be ok for awhile.....
customer_reviews.text: Its surprisingly warm and comfortable.....it more velvety than suadeish......and we ordered the red.....its a Santa Claus Suit Red or Brothel Red. The matching shams are not King size....they're standard size. But for the price we're very pleased.....we were replacing a several hundred dollars fake buckskin comforter which we had wornout and thought wed give it a try..... For the price.....were not unhappy.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Waste of money
customer_reviews.text: Kind of disappointed with this purchase, when we received it, it already had a bunch of very long loose threads, and the white part had a few black dirt pieces stuck to it. For this to be from amazon basics is a joke. I expected better quality for the price im paying. And if you live in a hotter climate like me (i live in florida) this is a huge waste of money because of how thick it is, it though it would be breathable but its not at all, we ended up having to get something else that was less heavy and more light weight
customer_reviews.author: eileen

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT PUT THIS IN THE DRYER!
customer_reviews.text: Whatever you do, do not follow the washing instructions on this item! I followed the washing instructions and it MELTED in my dryer! I took it out before it was even dry, and I still have melted fleece and melted plush fabric. It's essentially ruined. Amazon needs to change the tag instructions on this item to say to line dry, or to dry flat, or air dry, or something. My dryer doesn't even get that hot, so I think this is ridiculous. The set is gorgeous - I just wish I had known not to let it touch my dryer before it got ruined.
customer_reviews.author: Emily

customer_reviews.title: Soft and Warm
customer_reviews.text: I love this blanket. I was looking for a blanket that is warm, soft, and reasonably priced, and this one checks it all off. It does have a sort of stuffy smell initially, but it goes away after a few days. The pillow shams are also a bit larger than my standard pillows, but it’s not that big of a deal. Overall quality is great. It is the softest and warmest blanket I’ve owned so far. I liked it so much I bought another one for our other bed. Also I bought the king size for our queen bed for a more draped over look.
customer_reviews.author: Jheneya

customer_reviews.title: The inside liner isn't what I expected
customer_reviews.text: I like the softness,it look's more blue then charcoal grey.I did a video to show the pillow sham,by the zipper,fabric is missing.I won't order another comforter from Amazon.They won't let me add my video to show you,but the fabric is missing all by the pillow sham zipper.The zipper easily get's stuck as well.
customer_reviews.author: Lavita Smith

customer_reviews.title: Exactly as Expected
customer_reviews.text: Soft, thick, and warm!! I love the charcoal color it looks great against the white. Perfect for winter time but can really get hot in summer/ warmer months. It is quality material and will last years but my cats claw did some damage on the grey side. It seems the grey smooth side is more susceptible to snags from claws than the white side. Overall I'm super happy with this blanket!
customer_reviews.author: Katharine R. Mueller

customer_reviews.title: Amazing Blanket
customer_reviews.text: Definitely my new favorite blanket. It is very soft and keeps you very warm. I’m a texture freak and I still love this blanket. The pillow cases feel the same as the blanket, which is a little much for me, so i just use them on the decorative pillows. (:
customer_reviews.author: Pink

customer_reviews.title: Soft but HOT
customer_reviews.text: Great price but booyyyyy does this thing “sleep” HOT! Definitely a winter comforter, not recommended for the summer. Even with a fan on, I was kicking off the blanket multiple Times throughout the night. Also, the pillow shams are HUGE!! Definitely not normal sized. I have regular pillows and I can’t use the new shams because they’re twice the size of the pillow.
customer_reviews.author: The Primetime Kid

customer_reviews.title: Snuggly, but Snags & Collects Dog Hair
customer_reviews.text: Out of the box, this comforter looks and feels great. If you are a dog free home, no problem. BUT, the fabric is a dog hair magnet and we have a short-haired white and black pointer mix. It will never be hair free, even after frequent vacuuming. Once a week washing just ain't happening as it's a very heavy load by itself and takes forever to dry. The top does snag and if one of the little snags is pulled...zip hole. Ask me how I know. It can be fixed with fabric glue, but then there's a spot.
customer_reviews.author: Jack R. Chappell

customer_reviews.title: more like a large thrown blanket
customer_reviews.text: The blanket is very thin. Its extremely soft but that will fade with washing im sure. The blanket is too small for a kind size bed. It acts more like a large throw blanket then a full on comforter. Im disappointed but I should have listened to the reviews more. It covers the top of the bed but not the sides at all. Maybe goes 6 in down each side i was hoping to cover the mattress sides alot more so the sheets don't show as much. Would not recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Garey C. Griffith Jr.

customer_reviews.title: Charcoal gray comforter
customer_reviews.text: The comforter is soft and so nice but if you’re going for charcoal just an FYI it has a slight green tint and is more of a medium gray color
customer_reviews.author: Amy Howard

customer_reviews.title: It WAS my favorite blanket
customer_reviews.text: Updated: less than 6 months of owning this comforter it was trashed. The white/soft side gets matted and junk gets stuck in the blanket. It ripped easily and was no longer fluffy. I'm sad, it was so nice at first but now I have to buy a new comforter and trash this one. This comforter is a dream. I ordered it at the end of the summer and it's a bit too warm in the heat but it's the softest and most comfortable blanket for fall / winter. My only complaint is I have a hard time getting out of bed!
customer_reviews.author: Dominique Bonsell

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Comforter...like sleeping in clouds.
customer_reviews.text: This comforter is so soft and cozy, I'm having a hard time getting out of bed. I ordered a king even though I have a queen sized bed. I always like a comforter a little bigger. I think the for is perfect, so if you have a king sized bed, it might not be as big as you would like.
customer_reviews.author: Kathy

customer_reviews.title: Soft but not durable
customer_reviews.text: This comforter and pillow set has a great color, is very soft, and is super comfy when lounging around. However, I haven't had it for very long and it is already sort of falling apart after some use. I think it is good for show, mostly, but can be mildly cuddled with
customer_reviews.author: Mason Grey

customer_reviews.title: Very soft, but melts in the dryer
customer_reviews.text: Washed this as soon as I received it according to the instructions on the tag (warm water, perm press wash, tumble dry low). After the first dry cycle, the comforter was still pretty wet since it's so large, so I put it back in the dryer for another cycle, still on low. After taking it out a second time, the polyester fabric was melted in some places. Very upset that this product is so low quality I can't even clean it properly.
customer_reviews.author: theasianpianist

customer_reviews.title: Charcoal color looks Green, not at all gray.
customer_reviews.text: The product is great. Very soft, seems well made. However, I purchased the charcoal and immediately thought I had mis-ordered or had been sent the wrong color. The comforter is Forest Green. Apparently it is technically Charcoal but it looks very Green. I ordered 2 of these for my daughters new rooms. They have gray wood flooring and light gray walls. This completely ruined the color scheme of the room but it's not worth trying to ship them back. Photo doesnt really capture how odd the color actually is, but I used 2 different shades of gray for reference. Very disappointed in the appearance but my daughters still love the softness of the blanket.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly Smith

customer_reviews.title: Pretty but way too thin
customer_reviews.text: The fabric on this comforter is very thin. The backside tends to stick to itself in some places. It is a pretty looking comforter and does feel very soft but i am sure it won’t last long with two cats and a dog sleeping with us. Update: the cat claws get caught in it and snag it constantly. I wash it frequently and the snags get worse and worse each time. The Sherpa inside has matted a little and is no where near as soft as it was. Don’t buy if you have critters who sleep with you and if you wash your comforters frequently. It does not hold up nice.
customer_reviews.author: Julie

customer_reviews.title: Almost a five star
customer_reviews.text: This comforter is so soft and the plum color is so rich. It's so warm, we were able to take off our additional blanket that we were using under our old comforter. Why I took off a star is because of the tags, they are large, hanging off the bottom and they are stitched into the comforter so I had to cut them out rather than easily detaching them as I've been able to do similar items and the stitching is very sensitive.
customer_reviews.author: riknik

customer_reviews.title: So soft and scrumptuous! LOVE IT!
customer_reviews.text: I chose the silvery grey and it is gorgeous on the bed, the Sherpa along with the microfleece is so soft and huggable, cozy and delightful. The 2 pillow shams are also microfleece on one side, Sherpa on the other - just great! Come winter I know this will be wonderfully warm. I've washed it only once and it came out absolutely beautiful, fluffy and snuggly. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: S family

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Ohmygosh, I love this comforter! It is the softest and coziest comforter I've ever owned. It is very warm - so you won't be able to use it year-round; but it makes you feel like you are staying in a fancy hotel. One caution: it is a little small. I use it on a king size bed and it is just barely big enough. There is maybe 7" of overhang on each side (when the bed is empty). I wish it were just a bit bigger, but I would still buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: Victoria G.

customer_reviews.title: A Heavy Blanket That’s Perfect For Winter
customer_reviews.text: The blanket is so soft and warm, looks exactly like the picture, and is definitely easy to clean. However, (and I’m sure most people know this, but it had to be said), it’s not a lightweight blanket. This blanket is heavy, and meant for cold temperatures in the winter, otherwise you’ll overheat BIG TIME. Otherwise it’s absolutely perfect, it’s soft and very good for snuggling into.
customer_reviews.author: Nathan

customer_reviews.title: Not durable
customer_reviews.text: It is soft and a nice colour, but it's not durable at allll. The blanket threads started to snap and rip. And there are various rips in it now, just from regular use. Kinda annoyed about it. I imagine this blanket wont last me the year, let alone 2 years. There will probably be so many little tears in it that it will start to destuff. The filling is already starting to come out in some of the larger tears.... Its is comfy, and soft and warm...but the material isn't what I expected for what I paid.
customer_reviews.author: VFGNC

customer_reviews.title: Defective top fabric?
customer_reviews.text: Warm, comfortable, lightweight. Quality of the top velvety fabric is terrible. Looks great. Falling apart. Weird slice cuts have appeared all over it. All in the same direction (top to bottom) like there’s a defect in the fabric weave. Haven’t figured out what’s causing this, but it won’t last through a wash/dry cycle, so it’s going in the garbage. It’s too bad. Everything else about it is great.
customer_reviews.author: Loretta Todd

customer_reviews.title: Unfortunate
customer_reviews.text: Unfortunately, I can already tell this comforter is not going to last long. I would take it as a minor loss if it actually wasn't as expensive as it is. I wouldn't mind the price if it was excellent quality but this isn't. There are loose threads everywhere which means the sewn squares will begin to unravel. This is very unfortunate because the comforter itself is soft and the color is very beautiful.
customer_reviews.author: Angie

customer_reviews.title: NOT IF YOU HAVE A CAT OR DOG
customer_reviews.text: This blanket was a dream when I first got it as a present,amazing softness.But after a few weeks I noticed little puffs of filling coming out of it.Upon closer inspection I saw that our small dogs nails were going through this blanket.We have several of these . sherpa blankets and this has never happened to any of themIf you have a cat or dog who shares your bed you might want to pass on this one!The mink feel is wonderful but not strong
customer_reviews.author: WOODY

customer_reviews.title: Great super soft and very warm comforter
customer_reviews.text: It is amazingly soft and very warm. It is not the lightest comforter but warmth is what I wanted. When you wash it be ready for it to take a long time to dry out.... once it was out it was in great shape. It seems to be very well made and fits our king size bed very well. The top is very soft and was enough to stop the invasion on my son to stop and appreciate it. I recommend it but will update after more use.
customer_reviews.author: DCLW

customer_reviews.title: beyond perfect!! just what i was looking for! recomended!!
customer_reviews.text: I bought two twin sets for my boys hoping to get them out of my husbands and my bed ( I also got them comforters witch you don't need with this set!!) it worked!! they love their beds so much more now! my goal was to make them as comfy as my bed, I defiantly succeeded with this set! you don't need a comforter like I assumed though! its its own comforter not a cover ! way better in my opinion! comfy and warm for winter!
customer_reviews.author: marisela hart

customer_reviews.title: Hard to keep white part clean
customer_reviews.text: Although this is one hell of a comfortable bed cover, the purple part is a lot softer and easier to clean, whereas the white fleece picks u every little piece of dirt and gets snagged on the fibers, meaning you have to pull the dirt off with your fingers since it doesn't come off in the wash. I wish both sides were purple, or at least made from the same material.
customer_reviews.author: H Herbert

customer_reviews.title: Soft and warm but light
customer_reviews.text: I think I rated this badly at first but it’s grown on me. It felt cheap at first but with the Sherpa side down its better- I’m just not a fan of Sherpa since it doesn’t wash too well. I found this because I searched for ugg comforter and this came up. I bought both to compare. The ugg kookaburra one is just normal cotton on top- this one is softer! I will be keeping this one!! My dog likes it too and it pairs with Lilly well.
customer_reviews.author: Alexandra

customer_reviews.title: Pillowcases should be sold separately
customer_reviews.text: Excellent quality. The comforter is warmer than most comforters I've had in the past and it and the pillowcases are all quite soft. The pillowcases also zip closed which is different but I like it. My pillows always used to move partway out of their case leaving a weird flap of fabric or they'd bunch up strangely. My only issue with this product is that buying more of the pillowcases would require buying the whole set a few more times. If the pieces of this set were sold separately as well, I'd definitely buy these pillowcases every time I needed any.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew Swartz

customer_reviews.title: absolutely gorgeous.
customer_reviews.text: i am so impressed with this comforter. it is absolutely gorgeous. its soft and warm but not too heavy, i may buy more as gifts. i would recommend cold wash on gentle , low heat dry. it does not shed. The shams zipper is kind of hard to find as it snuggles down into the Sherpa.
customer_reviews.author: Jeri cullinan

customer_reviews.title: Good for the price
customer_reviews.text: I got this 3 set comforter on sale for less then $40 - king size - charcoal. It is good for the money, washes well and dries on low heat. It has however a cheap feeling and appearance if you look closer. The plus is the 2 pillow cases w zipper. If you are not a super picky person go ahead and buy it. Also: makes a good gift during cold season.
customer_reviews.author: Danny

customer_reviews.title: It’s hot
customer_reviews.text: This blanket is hot. I live in New England and wanted a comforter for all weather. With two people in the bed this blanket literally makes you drip sweat even on a 40 degree night using it. Might be good for someone who lives in a very very cold place
customer_reviews.author: Lauren

customer_reviews.title: Great product, quick shipping, overall very happy , thank you
customer_reviews.text: Love the bed set especially for the price . I didn’t realize it was soft and fuzzy on the brown side too more like a velvet feel and my son loves it , I thought I had a hard time getting him up and ready for school before but now he wants to stay in his comfy bed . Thank you , thinking about getting another color just to have it’s such a good deal !
customer_reviews.author: nicole paprocki

customer_reviews.title: I love this more then Iv loved any blanket
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this with high expectations which I usually don’t do but I really liked the blanket. It came a day earlier then expected!!! I was thrown off with the box not knowing it was vacuum sealed. Took it out of the packages sealing and it puffed up HUGE!!!❤️ Washed it like direction said to on tag, dried it on low delicate (took almost 2 hours to dry in dryer) but have it on my bed and it’s amazing!! It’s so soft, and so cozy. Definitely going to be purchasing another one in a different color!! 5 ⭐️ all the way!!! I love it!
customer_reviews.author: Melissa Buckley

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful but doesn’t last
customer_reviews.text: I love love love how soft the fabric is. I fell in love with so fast but then I started to notice the blanket falling apart. It keeps coming apart and the seems and I can slowly start to see the whole thing fall apart. I am as gentle as possible when cleaning and handling but the quality is just not there. Very unfortunate because I really love the texture. The coloring was off as well. I ordered the grey and it looks more blue.
customer_reviews.author: cecily

customer_reviews.title: Very thick and large barely fit full size in washer.
customer_reviews.text: I love the softness and warmth of this blanket. Although, it will be too warm come spring/summer. Its wonderful for colder weather. The full size barely fits in my washer and definitely not in the dryer so I have to hang dry.. Have just purchased another blanket to switch out with on the days I wash my bedding since it takes 2 days to dry completely! Overall I really like this blanket. Dog and cat totally approve!!
customer_reviews.author: Amy

customer_reviews.title: Warm, cushy, softness!
customer_reviews.text: So warm, so soft, so cushy!! I need one of these for my bed next. I got this for my 6 year old daughter's bed and she is in love with it. It's very warm though. Most nights she sweats under it though we keep oir home cool during the night. I'm excited to use it during the cold Minnesota winter. Great blanket set that comes with matching minky pillows.
customer_reviews.author: Tasha LeAnn

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money!
customer_reviews.text: I've had this blanket for about 3 weeks now and I love it! It's super soft and comfortable and also not to heavyset to where it's too hot! I love it! And the pillow cases are great. Only thing I would change is the hole to out the pillows in the pillow cases... maybe make it bigger because my pillows are ripping the hole! It still zips up all the way though!! They arent ruined. I've also washed it too and it didnt do any damage and the blanket is still perfect, the softness did not wash away!
customer_reviews.author: Trinity Holmes

customer_reviews.title: It's ok but the sizing is small
customer_reviews.text: The blanket and pillow cases arrived nicely in a air tight plastic bag. The blanket was very soft as well. I threw it on the bed to see how it looked and noticed the white fuzzy pieces fall off easily and the sizing is not accurate. I have a king size mattress and the sheets would fit a queen sized mattress better. It barely covers the sides of my mattress.
customer_reviews.author: Drose

customer_reviews.title: Best blanket I have bought!
customer_reviews.text: I really like this blanket because it is incredibly soft and plush, but not so heavy that I would not use it in the summer/spring. It's lightweight, so it is easy to carry and wash. Highly recommend this for anyone who likes fuzzy and soft blankets.
customer_reviews.author: Robin

customer_reviews.title: It is super soft but the seams split easily
customer_reviews.text: Yes, it is very soft, but the quality is terrible. I had to replace the first one after about a week because it was splitting at the seams. The replacement is doing the same thing. I am disappointed because I like the idea of this fluffy comforter for my son‘s bed. I have no idea what will happen when I wash it.
customer_reviews.author: Ricci Family

customer_reviews.title: Plush....Runs Small
customer_reviews.text: These are so soft and plush. At first I thought this is "just fleece", but it is so much better. It does feel like fur. The Sherpa side doesn't appear to shed. This run small. I bought the full/queen and it fits my twin size bed perfectly. My twin bed does sit up high. It's on one of those metal frames that replaces a box spring mattress.
customer_reviews.author: Trend

customer_reviews.title: Try this before divorce over fans at night
customer_reviews.text: Super warm and soft! My husband always complains about being cold at night since I sleep with two fans on throughout the night and this blanket was the last option before divorce lol The only complaint I’ve ever had so far is the Sherpa does start to matter and pill after prolonged use and washing but this is normal for Sherpa and can easily be reversed.
customer_reviews.author: Breanna Garcia

customer_reviews.title: Warm and Soft
customer_reviews.text: I live in high desert where the days are warm and nights are cool. It is very windy and we get snow every once in a while. Night time temps in the winter in the 20s to low 30s. I turn the furnace off at night so my bedroom hovers around 60F in the morning. This comforter is warmer than the 3 micro fleece blankets I was using before. It is definitely a keeper.
customer_reviews.author: Desert Rat

customer_reviews.title: Bought this for a guest and now the guest plans to leave with it.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for my visiting mother who's always complaining of it being cold. She's very happy with the blanket to the point she's making room in her suitcase to take the blanket with it. I have to admit, it loses its softness on one side after washing but you can just use the other side which remains soft. My mother raved about it so much that I bought a second one a few weeks later for myself and I am in love with it as well.
customer_reviews.author: A Gi

product_meta.title: AmazonBasics Micromink Sherpa Comforter Set - Ultra-Soft, Fray-Resistant, King, Taupe - 3-Piece
product_meta.description: Color:Taupe| Size:King| Pattern Name:Bed SetAn Amazon brand
feature_bullets: Covered in ultra-soft micromink polyester on one side and cloud-like white faux sherpa fleece on the other.
Reinforced with stylish box stitching, the comforter resists fraying and sliding, staying put nicely on your bed

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.5 out of 5 stars13,743 ratings4.5 out of 5 stars
